title: Unified UI
description: We are working on a new UI, first step is having the same for all platforms

title: EmuDeck for Android
description: Now you can install your favourites emulators on Android

title: Remove Steam Rom Manager Cache
description: Added a new button in Manage Emulators to clear SRM entries

title: Multilanguage
description: We've added preliminary support for spanish, french and italian

title: Lime3DS
description: We've added the new 3DS emulator, Lime3DS. Installing it will migrate your saves from Citra to Lime3DS, don't forget to update your SRM entries
